name: Loopy Mansion
description:
Controls:

Move with WASD   

Attack with A  

Defend with D 

Interact with space

Try and escape the mansion before 6am!!  The game will start at 6PM. Traverse the mansion to solve a puzzle and fight other ghosts to escape the night!  
Losing a battle will reset the night, but a certain something will help you escape, can you figure out what?  

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/coming-soon
